Name: Tower Tank: TD Reversal
About the game: Tower Tank: TD Reversal is an arcade-style protect-your-tank and destroy-the-enemy game. You are tasked to protect your tank from enemy tower attacks until it reaches the goal. It is a take on the 'reverse' tower defense genre, which, instead of building towers and destroying enemies, you play as the advancing enemies to get to the goal. Player interacts with the game mostly via arcade-style buttons and point-n-click. Feature(s): - 10 levels of single player (est. 90 minutes of game-play). - Different skills to help with your mission. - Different upgrade strategies to suit your play-style. Basic game-play: - Press the big button to deploy tank. - Press the small pink button to deploy minions as decoy. - Click on arrow on the screen to toggle direction. - Collect repair packs and use them when health is low. - Press reverse button (blue) to reverse for a short period. Note: Full-screen mode is not supported.
